channel.title: apis on Alfred Nutile
channel.description: Recent content in apis on Alfred Nutile

item.title: Dealing with Oauth2 Server and Laravel for both a local app login and for remote apps using Lucadegasperi/oauth2-server-laravel
item.description: This is all based around this library https://github.com/lucadegasperi/oauth2-server-laravel I am building and API to be used by an iOs and Android client I will be making soon. But I also needed the filter system to deal with my local Laravel view that was using the api via an Angular driven widget so the user can go to the website as well. So the website is where the user can go to do change settings, subscription updates etc, but in that case they are logged in via the Laravel login form.

item.title: Github CLI to get Teams and Members of an Org
item.description: Needed to make a quick library for pulling down this info and making it a CSV file. The libraries made this super easy. But it was hard to get all the emails since these can only been seen if in the users profile. the link https://github.com/alnutile/org_reports
